name: vdl-test-suite
description: Test suite to demonstrate interopability between various VC issuers & verifiers.

scripts.parallel: npm run generate-vdls && mocha tests/ --require esm --reporter ./node_modules/mocha-w3c-interop-reporter/index.js --reporter-options body="$PWD/body.hbs",matrix="$PWD/matrix.hbs",reportDir="$PWD/reports",respec="$PWD/respecConfig.json",title="Verifiable Driver's License Interoperability Report 1.0",helpers="$PWD/templateHelpers.js",suiteLog='./suite.log' --parallel --timeout 15000
scripts.test: npm run generate-vdls && mocha tests/ --require esm --reporter ./node_modules/mocha-w3c-interop-reporter/index.js --reporter-options body="$PWD/body.hbs",matrix="$PWD/matrix.hbs",reportDir="$PWD/reports",respec="$PWD/respecConfig.json",title="Verifiable Driver's License Interoperability Report 1.0",helpers="$PWD/templateHelpers.js",suiteLog='./suite.log' --timeout 15000
